name: examples-kitchen-sink
description: This is an example app used to showcase Cypress.io testing. For a full reference of our documentation, go to docs.cypress.io

scripts.git-commit: git add app --all . && git commit --all --message 'gh-pages update'
scripts.git-push: git push origin gh-pages --force && git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npm run git-commit && npm run git-push
